/* eslint-disable */import{AdditiveBlending,Mesh,MeshBasicMaterial,PlaneGeometry}from'three';export const getFlash=map=>{const geometry=new PlaneGeometry();const material=new MeshBasicMaterial({transparent:true,// color: 'red',
map,blending:AdditiveBlending,opacity:0});const mesh=new Mesh(geometry,material);mesh.position.z=-7.1;mesh.position.y=6;mesh.scale.setScalar(13);return{geometry,material,mesh};};
